list.title: About blog
list.content: The blog function corresponds to inserting images into the text. In addition, it becomes possible to set the timer with the form function.

list.title: Smartphone
list.content: The blog function [BiND Press] corresponded to posts from smartphone. * Cooperation with BiND cloud is necessary.

list.title: Make with SiGN
list.content: We will introduce the points when making top images preferred by smartphones using BiND's image editing function [SiGN Pro].

list.title: I tried to verify variously where to set the margin of the Web site.
list.content: Margin often tends to be complicated due to many items. I tried to find out where to set the best place to manage margins with BiND.

list.title: Card style design made with BiND
list.content: We will show you how to create a card design that makes full use of the grid style layout by yourself with BiND.

list.title: Official guidebook special edition [How to use BiND Press] Notice provided by PDF
list.content: We have prepared the official guidebook special edition [How to use BiND Press (PDF)] for those who have signed more than BiND cloud pro course or more (including BiND 9 special course). Please login to the BiND cloud and download and use it.

list.title: Frequently Asked Questions and Problems
list.content: We have summarized the correspondence situation of BiND 9's frequent inquiries and defect contents as confirmed by our company at the moment.

list.title: About backing up site data
list.content: BiND 9 recommends that you periodically back up your site data in order to use it with confidence.
